features.name: Hub Core
features.desc: The main components required to bring everything together.

goals.name: Sub-Window System
goals.comment: Flexible system of draggable windows to be used by all aspects of the Hub

goals.name: Persistent Data Manager
goals.comment: Save and load user options and any other persistent data seamlessly

goals.name: Service Credentials Window
goals.comment: Manage your third-party service credentials in a window where the content is obscured to help prevent on-stream leaks

goals.name: Notification System
goals.comment: Shows notifications at the top of the screen. Rarely used

goals.name: Debug Output Window
goals.comment: View output messages that can tell you about errors or important information

goals.name: Window Hotkeys
goals.comment: Use hotkeys to toggle viewing each kind of window

goals.name: Fetch and File Utilities
goals.comment: A set of methods for Hub features to use that make it easier to read / write files and get data from the web

goals.name: MultiPlatform User Cache
goals.comment: Allows you to view data that has been cached for viewers, like profile images

goals.name: MultiPlatform Chat Window
goals.comment: One chat to rule them all! Combines messages from all sources

features.name: API Integration: Twitch
features.desc: Integrations with Twitch's chat and data APIs.

goals.name: Chat: Read
goals.comment: Read messages coming in from Twitch

goals.name: Chat: Write
goals.comment: Write messages back to Twitch

goals.name: Profile Data
goals.comment: Gets profile data like display name and profile image URLs

features.name: API Integration: Kick
features.desc: Integrations with Kick's chat and data APIs.

goals.name: Chat: Read
goals.comment: Read messages coming in from Kick

goals.name: Chat: Write
goals.comment: The Kick API Doesn't Support This Yet!

goals.name: Profile Data
goals.comment: Gets profile data like display name and profile image URLs

features.name: API Integration: StreamElements
features.desc: Integrations with Twitch's chat and data APIs.

goals.name: Points Balance Fetch
goals.comment: Fetch SteamElements Points balance info.

goals.name: Points Leaderboard
goals.comment: View the top 10 point holders.

goals.name: Points Purchasing
goals.comment: Viewers can use StreamElements Points as a currency to perform actions like entering a raffle.

goals.name: Tips Integration
goals.comment: Will trigger Hub events based when a StreamElements tip is received.

goals.name: Tips Leaderboard Integration
goals.comment: Will allow you to see the top SE tip contributors.

goals.name: Contest Integration
goals.comment: Will trigger events based on when a StreamElements contest begins or ends and who won.

features.name: Background Scene Editor
features.desc: A tool to create custom animated backgrounds using layers of CSS.

goals.name: Core Layer Types
goals.comment: Solid Fill, Gradient Fill, Image

goals.name: Layer Type: Pattern
goals.comment: Uses the 'background' CSS property to create repeating patterns with images or gradients.

goals.name: Layer Type: Video
goals.comment: A video layer via URL. Example videos are Imgur URLs

goals.name: Layer Type: Filter
goals.comment: A layer that changes layers below it. You can use any CSS filter function like 'blur()', 'hue-rotate()', or 'contrast()'

goals.name: Layer Type: WebGL
goals.comment: A layer that will take advantage of custom GLSL shaders. Fancy stuff!

goals.name: Layer Tools
goals.comment: Clone layers, move them up or down, delete layers, toggle layers on or off

goals.name: Scene Profiles
goals.comment: Use profiles to store sets of layers for different scenes

goals.name: Default / Preset Profiles
goals.comment: Includes default profiles and allows you to add a profile from presets

goals.name: Save / Load Profiles As Files
goals.comment: Allows you to save and load scene profiles as JSON files

features.name: Viewer Inventories
features.desc: View and edit items in viewers' inventories.

goals.name: Item Library Window
goals.comment: Allows you to create and edit any number of custom items for viewers to earn or collect

goals.name: Viewer Inventory Viewer
goals.comment: View who has what and how much of it

goals.name: Give Item Window
goals.comment: Give a specific item to a specific viewer

goals.name: Random Item Rewards
goals.comment: Allows viewers to receive a random item from the Item Library as a reward

goals.name: Custom Item Properties
goals.comment: Allows you to add custom properties to items, which could be used by other Hub features

features.name: Creature Catching
features.desc: Creatures that you customise will appear and can be caught by chatters.

goals.name: Creature Roster Editor
goals.comment: Create, modify, and remove creatures from the creature roster.

goals.name: Creature Appearance Settings
goals.comment: Edit how frequently creatures appear

goals.name: Creature Appearance Overlay
goals.comment: Adds an image popup for creature appearances

goals.name: Creature Images
goals.comment: Allows creatures to use images from the web, including transparency

goals.name: Creature Points Rewards
goals.comment: Allows StreamElements points to be rewarded when a creature is caught

goals.name: Creature Rarity
goals.comment: Allows some creatures to appear more frequently than others. Not currently in use!
